testCase.requirementText: File group identifier mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@ID An xml:id identifier for the file group used for internal package references. It must be unique within the package.
testCase.description: The requirement links to http://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#the-use-of-identifiers and simple xml-validation will catch if IDs are not unique. This will be tested by normal schema validation. However, the ID-attribute is optional according to METS.xsd, so this testcase has one rule to check if the ID-attribute exists

rule.description: There MUST be an ID-attribute on every fileGrp

error.message: There MUST be an ID-attribute on every fileGrp
